ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Sole_Proprietorship", Registration__r.Record_Type_Name__c = "Public_Works", NOT(ISBLANK(ITIN__c)), NOT(ISBLANK( RetypeITIN__c )), ITIN__c <> RetypeITIN__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure that ITIN and Re-typed ITIN match.
